2:
--------------------
<Text: Eminönü:  Eminönü covers roughly the area on which the ancient Byzantium was built.>
Triplets:<Eminönü
4:
--------------------
Text: Eminönü:  And up on the hill stands Topkapı Palace, the Blue Mosque (Sultanahmet Camii) and Hagia Sophia (Aya Sofya).
Triplets:<Eminönü
5:
--------------------
<Text: Eminönü:  Thus Eminönü is the main tourist destination in Istanbul.>

Triplets:<Eminönü
7:
--------------------
Text: Eminönü:  Since the resident population of Eminönü is low today, it rejoined the capital district Fatih in 2009.
Triplets:<Eminönü
